scripts.copy: cp -rf node_modules/reveal.js/css public/css && cp -rf node_modules/reveal.js/js public/js && cp -rf node_modules/reveal.js/lib public/lib && cp -rf node_modules/reveal.js/plugin public/plugin && cp node_modules/reveal.js/demo.html public/demo.html && cp node_modules/reveal.js/index.html public/simple.html && cp node_modules/reveal.js/README.md public/README.md
